Description.Name: ComStar News Bureau
Description.Details: Ronin defeated Both official statements and reports from third parties now confirm that, for all practical purposes, the Ronin have been defeated militarily. There was a fear that the remaining Ronin forces on [[DM.SystemDefs[starsystemdef_Radstadt],Radstadt]] and [[DM.SystemDefs[starsystemdef_Memmingen],Memmingen]] would attempt a last act of defiance, similar to the Ronin holdouts in [[DM.SystemDefs[starsystemdef_Predlitz],Predlitz]] during the last days of August. Sho-sho Johannsen, along with three other Ronins, intended to make the fusion reactor buried in a mining colony go critical. By quick reaction and a great deal of luck, Sho-sho Johannsen's Battlemaster was crushed only meters away from the optimal firing range when Republican Lojtnant Martens blasted through the cavern's ceiling and his Charger fell on top of the Ronin commander's mech.

Description.Name: ComStar News Bureau
Description.Details:
Radstadt's Ronins, remains of 49th Mechanized Tank and the 603rd Tank regiments gave up when republican forces were reinforced by additional troops.

On the 29th of last month, Kashira Barker — the last ranking officer of the Ronin holdouts on Memmingen — approached a DCMS patrol with a white sheet tied to his Dragon's left arm. His surrender signaled the surrender of the rest of the Ronin forces on the planet.

With this surrender there are no significant Ronin forces remaining in this war.



Meanwhile, the Andurien Crisis is still ongoing, with [[DM.SystemDefs[starsystemdef_NewRoland],New Roland]] invaded by [[DM.Factions[faction_LiaoA4],Warrior House Dai Da Chi]] and [[DM.Factions[faction_LiaoC10],Kamakura's Hussars]]. Many outside observers consider a Capellan victory almost certain.

This has been the CNB November broadcast.
